holidays.title: According to Hoyle Day
holidays.description: Who is Hoyle? And how did he become an expert on rules and card games?

holidays.title: Anniversary of The Slovak National Uprising
holidays.description: On Slovak National Uprising Anniversary, we’re celebrating peace and honoring the lost.

holidays.title: Founding Anniversary of the Senate
holidays.description: Get ready for a historical trip to the politics of the Philippine Senate.

holidays.title: Individual Rights Day
holidays.description: Celebrate your individual rights and the man who made it happen — John Locke.

holidays.title: International Cabernet Day
holidays.description: Get your wine glasses ready for some Cabernet this International Cabernet Day!

holidays.title: International Day against Nuclear Tests
holidays.description: Let’s raise awareness about the devastating effects of nuclear weapons.

holidays.title: More Herbs, Less Salt Day
holidays.description: Salt is out, seasoning is in!

holidays.title: National Chop Suey Day
holidays.description: Let’s enjoy hot chop suey as we learn about its history and facts.

holidays.title: National Sports Day
holidays.description: Calling all sports fans! Join us in celebrating field hockey and all other sporting activities.

holidays.title: Chelsea DeBoer’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality T.V star always keeps pushing forward and never gives up!

holidays.title: GG Allin’s Birthday
holidays.description: Allin’s artistic expressions hinged on the extreme and he is still known for his wild performances.

holidays.title: Iris Apfel’s Birthday
holidays.description: The public saw Apfel in her full glory, and that started her career in mainstream fashion.

holidays.title: John Fish’s Birthday
holidays.description: This popular YouTube vlogger is a very meticulous student and consistent with his work.

holidays.title: John Locke’s Birthday
holidays.description: The Father of Liberalism, British philosopher John Locke, continues to influence philosophical discourse, even today.

holidays.title: Liam Payne’s Birthday
holidays.description: This master musician and singer has always been a force to be reckoned with.

holidays.title: Michael Jackson’s Birthday
holidays.description: The King of Pop still remains a cultural figure and continues to influence countless artists.

holidays.title: Newton Pittman’s Birthday
holidays.description: The popular American voice artist has built a major fan following with his anime dubs.

holidays.title: William Levy’s Birthday
holidays.description: The former model and actor became an international sensation for his good looks and acting abilities.
